item.description:
So we'll be cracking our skulls on the 'hard-problem' a little.

Leaving aside issues of causality and ontology for a bit, I'd like to specifically focus on to what extent we can even talk about qualia/p-consciousness/what-it-is-likeness within any language.
From my point of view, this is the key first step to have any hope of making progress on what is probably a hopeless problem anyway. I'll try to get a little write-up ready beforehand to give us some framework.

In the meantime, our friends from stanford are a good starting point stanford philosophy encyclopedia

See you then!
